  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eln:demoportal</catalog>
            <entry>1931</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="no">Øret - sanseceller</string>
            <string language="en">The Ear - senses</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Ohr - Richtungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'oreille - sens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A orelha - sentidos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'orecchio - sensi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το αυτί - αισθήσεις</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El oído - sentidos</string>
          </title>
          <language>no</language>
          <description>
            <string language="no">Hvordanoppfatter øret lyd? Se hva som skjer i øret når en lyd spilles.</string>
            <string language="en">How does the ear perceive sound? Watch what happens in the ear when a sound is played.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="no">øret</string>
            <string language="en">ear</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie nimmt das Ohr Ton wahr? Uhr, was im Ohr
geschieht, wenn ein Ton gespielt wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment l'oreille perçoit-elle le bruit ? 
Montre ce qui se produit dans l'oreille quand un bruit est 
joué.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como a orelha percebe o som? Relógio o que 
acontece na orelha quando um som for jogado.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come l'orecchio percepisce il suono? 
Vigilanza che cosa accade nell'orecchio quando un suono è 
giocato.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς το αυτί αντιλαμβάνεται τον ήχο; Ρολόι τι 
συμβαίνει στο αυτί όταν παίζεται ένας ήχος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Cómo el oído percibe el sonido? Reloj 
qué sucede en el oído cuando se juega un sonido.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ohr</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">oreille</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">orelha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">orecchio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αυτί</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">oído</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
